item.title: Organization design is a choose from systems thinking aspect
item.description: Notice If your team is less than 10 people, the major factor of team is most about individual ability and skill instead of designing organization. However, when you are in a large team (>30 or more), organization design play a critical role to efficiency. Viewpoint From a viewpoint of new gradated student(me), I summarized few points which impressed me. 1. All about objectives Every design(specifically means organization) should sets clear main objective and secondary objective.
